Summary: A fire ball possible asteroid going in a straight line.
divs: Sighting Detailsit was about 10:30 pm. i was walking home from a fireworks show at well park in elmore ohio and some people i was passing said look up there. i was curios and looked up and saw this red glare. i first thought an astroid but then my eyes ajusted and i saw a flickering ball.it was pretty high in the sky and went in a straight line for about 10 minutes.first i thought i shouldve broght my camera and after i lost sight i rushed home to tell my parents. i watched untill it was a small ball in the far away sky and dissapeared at about 11:00 pm. i know there are witnesses including myself that were wacthing
trends: There has been one other sighting in Elmore
There were no other sightings in Elmore on or around June 28th 2009
